QuotationDescription: Create a life that feels good on the inside, not just one that looks good on the outside.
To know yourself is to be confident. To be confident is to fearlessly express your potential.
There is nothing more important than this moment.
Follow your intuition, it will always lead you to the right destination.
Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.
Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life.
The most important time in the world is the time you make for yourself.
Trust me when i say, you are capable of anything imaginable.
The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
Science is not only compatible with spirituality; it is a profound source of spirituality.
Success begins where comfort zones end.
Ideas are like sparksâ€”when nurtured, they light up the world.
Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
The most important thing is to enjoy your life to be happy it's all that matters.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
